name: eManager Template Package
summary: Learn about .XEZ files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: X-Genics eManager is a hub from which businesses can monitor and report on key metrics, including performance, quality, and regulatory compliance. To do so, businesses use SmartApps accessible from within eManager.

instructions: For instructions on how to use XEZ files with X-Genics eManager, refer to the program's documentation.

If you want to extract and view the constituent files an XEZ file contains, rename it to use the .zip extension and open it with 7-Zip (Windows), The Unarchiver (Mac), or any other Zip-decompression utility.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
